title: Macbook Air A1466: Boots, Apple Logo and then goes black
message:
Hey Everyone!

Got a Macbook Air 2013. Turns on, shows the apple logo then cuts to a black display.
I have tried booting with several MacOS Installation USB but it does the same thing as mentioned above.
Removed the SSD and tried booting with MacOS USB.
Replaced the SSD and tried booting with MacOS USB, but it does the same thing.

I believe it might be a hardware issue but not sure what to check for.

Thanks,
Sam

title: Macbook Air A1466: Boots, Apple Logo and then goes black
message: How long before image is lost? Checked SMC_LID?

title: Macbook Air A1466: Boots, Apple Logo and then goes black
message: Nvm Macbook had a faulty coil, all good now.
